document_data.name: Brightvigil
document_data.mainbody: '''Brightvigil''' was a potion that protected against sleep-inducing [[magical]] effects.{{Cite dragon/300/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Old Angrath's Smokehouse|85}}
document_data.Description: Brightvigil was a light, clear liquid made by the [[sorceress]] and [[alchemist]] [[Angrath Dree]] from [[herb]]s and saps found in [[northwest Faerûn]]. It could be purchased from her at [[Old Angrath's Smokehouse]] in [[Red Larch]], or possibly from secondary vendors elsewhere. The usual price for a single dose was 30 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers: The effects of brightvigil lasted one hour. During that hour the imbiber was much less likely to be affected by ''[[sleep]]'' spells and similar magics.
